datatypeProperties.comment: Does the standard require control processes to be in place for food / feed health and nutritional requirements
Does the standard require control processes for nutritional requirements to be in place for food / feed production
Does the standard require control processes to be in place for management of non-conforming products
Does the standard require control processes to be in place for packaging material and procedures
Does the standard require control processes to be in place for food product analysis and testing
Does the standard require control processes to be in place for food product development
Does the standard require control processes to be in place for product transportation procedures
Does the standard require control processes to be in place for quantity control
Does the standard require specifications to be available for all raw materials, intermediate and final food products
Does the standard require control processes to be in place for verification/calibration of monitoring devices
